name: Flappy Aloupeep
description:
This was made to celebrate Enna Alouette's Birthday. I just wanted to contribute something to the community and I hope everyone will enjoy this simple little game that was made in a day. Can you get pass 100 pipes to get the "fake“ aka supa!?

Press [Space] or [MouseButtons] to play.

Note: Most monitors will have to zoom out to be able to view the entire game. The score supa is just a pop-up, it will not be saved.
Please be patient if there is a bug as I am still quite new to game development.

@SonderLogs
Jaiden Lee
